title: Energy. Ep. 1. The Dilemma
brief_description: Discusses past, present and future energy growth patterns. Explores problems of supply and demand, depletion of fossil fuels, our dependency and economic and social problems. Stresses societies’ need to develop ways of using less energy. Suitable for secondary level.
